description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Recall your memories of the past by combating aliens, vixens and zombies. Teleport to three different environments and times. Fight robots, magic doors and earthlings.
description.short: Recall your memories of the past by combating aliens, vixens and zombies. Teleport to three different environments and times. Fight robots, magic doors and earthlings.
